subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Pioneer Astronaut Wally Schirra Dead
body:
NASA says former Mercury 7 astronaut Wally Schirra has died at 84. As part 
of the Mercury 7 team he orbited the earth six times in one of NASA's early 
manned space missions.

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details.
